provider.title: AI Provider
provider.description: Select the AI service provider to use

customApiUrl.title: Custom API URL (Optional)
customApiUrl.description: Only needed when selecting "Custom API". Ending with / ignores v1 version, ending with # forces the input address

fetchModels.title: Fetch Model List
fetchModels.description: Click to fetch available models from API
fetchModels.label: Fetch Models

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness of generated text, range 0-1

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens
maxTokens.description: Limit the maximum number of tokens generated

systemPrompt.title: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Set the role and behavior of the AI
systemPrompt.placeholder: You are a helpful AI assistant.

slider.title: Slider Setting
slider.description: Drag the slider to adjust the value

hint.title: ðŸ’¡Important Notice
hint.description: This is a hint message to provide important information to users.

select.title: Select Option
select.description: Choose an option from the dropdown list

reset.title: Reset Settings
reset.description: Reset all settings to default values
reset.label: Reset
reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values?
reset.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values? This action cannot be undone.
reset.message: All settings have been reset to default values
